alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 2:50PM EST until January 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations of a few hundredths of an inch. Total snow and sleet accumulations of less than an inch. A mix of freezing rain, sleet, and snow will spread from southwest to northeast Thursday morning through early Thursday afternoon. Mixed precipitation will changeover to all rain Thursday afternoon. * WHERE...Wayne and Northern Cayuga counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will result in slippery roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow and ice reports through our website or social media.
